metadata.title: CVE-2021-41805 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: HashiCorp Consul Enterprise before 1.8.17, 1.9.x before 1.9.11, and 1.10.x before 1.10.4 has Incorrect Access Control. An ACL token (with the default operator:write permissions) in one namespace can be used for unintended privilege escalation in a different namespace.

criterions.comment: consul package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
